ygData.subject: Re: Geez! - new info?
ygData.msgSnippet: Guys Just an addon.. . . don t know if its useful at all. . . but on the new server. . . had my necro in a group in the mino caves. . and we got attacked by to
ygData.messageBody:
Guys

Just an addon.. . . don't know if its useful at all. . . but on the new
server. . . had my necro in a group in the mino caves. . and we got attacked
by to named gnomes. . . Lord something. . and. . really sorry I can't
remember the names. . will try to check my log. . .

But anyway. . they conned blue to me at lev 8 and had 2 mino's with them. .
that were red. . only slavers. . but we died . . . so I never found out what
they dropped =(.

Well. . it wasn't meldrith. . . has anyone seen them before?

Do they hold books. . .?

Never seen them when I've camped the caves before. . just a suggestion. . .

Wibblers -
----- Original Message -----
From: Big Dave <xceller@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 11:20 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Geez!


> From: Big Dave <xceller@...>
>
> I've read all your messages since I got on this list, and so far nothing
you
> have stated has come from any of the game designers, programmers, or
> developers. I remember your rotten letter before you supposedly quit, I
read
> your apology and promise to provide information in the future, and I've
read
> you flaming other people for being down on you and I never said a thing
about
> any of it until now...because now you are making these absolute and
unequivocal
> statments about how there is no 3rd book etc. and I'm simply not going to
> believe it just because you say it. Nor am I going to believe it because
you
> say that some GM says it, and the reason for that is because we have
already
> gotten conflicting statements from GMs! One says tinkering is fine,
another
> says it is broken, someone else says there is a 3rd book and yet another
source
> says there isn't. I still say nothing that comes from a Guide or even a
staff
> GM means anything...good or bad.
> If you took what I wrote as a flame maybe YOU should re-read what I wrote
> instead of automatically going into defenseive mode.
>
> Joshua Bednarz wrote:
>
> > From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
> >
> > GM's are told stuff. Guides are volunteers, but GMs are people that work
> > actually in the Verant building, they know whats going on. They work at
the
> > building, answering petitions and get payed for it. It is part of thier
job
> > responsibilities to know what is going on, so that they do NOT give
false
> > information. Now...if you didn't read the message I sent here about that
> > earlier, then you don't even have a right to be flaming me.
> >
> > >How do you know Josh? Are you one of Verant's game designers, planners,
> > >programmers, or developers? Are you related to any of them and they
have
> > >told
> > >you this is a fact? Or are you as ignorant as the rest of us and just
> > >going by
> > >what someone told you?
> > >There are enough rumors and disinformation about the 3rd book,
collapsible
> > >fishing pole, and fireworks going around that I wonder if anyone on any
> > >server
> > >really has solid information. Until I recieve some word by an
Everquest
> > >programmer or developer I'm keeping my mind open.
> > >Don't count any information you have been told by the guides or GM's as
> > >factual. None of them created this game.
> >
> >
>
> >
